name: Fork Fight: Hit the target!
description:
Play the most challenging arcade game: discover the levels, align the target and fight with your fork, knife, sword etc.
Throw forks to the target to make them collapse, but be careful! You should not hit the fork that you threw before.
Beat the boss to unlock special forks, knives, swords, and other goodies!
Hundreds of unique levels! With each new level, you’ll get more skills to become a master!
You will see that it’s the perfect way to spend your time!
Features:
● Creatively and deliberately designed hundreds of levels!
● Engaging graphic design & animations!
● Free & easy to play, challenging to master!
● Share your scores and dare your friends
● Leaderboard that lets you compete with everyone

Have fun!
